title: My unlocked pixel 4xl ,for whatever reason, doesn't have the "hold for me" feature. Amy reason why ?
content: I don't have the "hold for me" feature and I would love to know why. I have searched through all of my settings it used to be in the phone settings on my 3XL and even showed on my regular pixel 4. I only buy unlocked phones not through carriers so I thought maybe it was a carrier thing but no.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
